title: Bamboozler 14 Mk III
content:
The Bamboozler 14 Mk III is a main weapon in Splatoon and Splatoon 2. It is a Bamboozler 14 Mk I with a different loadout and a gold color scheme.

The Bamboozler 14 Mk III shares its overall design with the Bamboozler 14 Mk I. However, the gun itself is golden brown (bearing a resemblance to dried or dead bamboo), while all the black parts have been turned gold. Interestingly, the Cuttlegear logo present on the Bamboozler 14 Mk II can be seen.

The Bamboozler 14 Mk III is one of eight weapons included in Sheldon's Picks Vol. 1 and was released on 13 April 2016 at 02:00 UTC.[1][2] It comes in a set with Burst Bombs and Inkstrike.

- The Bamboozler 14 Mk III is a middleweight weapon.

- Ink consumption scales from 2.8% to 7% depending on the charge level.
The full-charge ink consumption of 7% allows players to fire 14 shots before needing to refill the ink supply.
This stat can be changed with Ink Saver (Main).

- The full-charge ink consumption of 7% allows players to fire 14 shots before needing to refill the ink supply.

- This stat can be changed with Ink Saver (Main).

- The Bamboozler 14 Mk III cannot store its charge.

- It takes 0.33 seconds to fully charge the weapon.
When charging a shot with an empty tank, the charge rate is 20%, permitting the player to fully charge a shot in 1.67 seconds.

- When charging a shot with an empty tank, the charge rate is 20%, permitting the player to fully charge a shot in 1.67 seconds.

- Shots cannot pierce through enemies.

- When charging while moving, the player's movement speed is set to 0.4 units per frame.

- Damage scales from 30 to 80 depending on the charge level.

- Shot velocity is always 40 units per frame, regardless of charge level.

- Shot distance is always 200, regardless of charge level.

- The full-charge ink consumption of 7% allows players to fire 14 shots before needing to refill the ink supply.

- This stat can be changed with Ink Saver (Main).

- When charging a shot with an empty tank, the charge rate is 20%, permitting the player to fully charge a shot in 1.67 seconds.

[3]

"The Bamboozler 14 Mk III takes the Mk I and swaps out the barrel for a different bamboo pipe. This set's selling point is how the main weapon and the Burst Bombs can really hammer your opponent! That's not to mention the Inkstrike, which can make life difficult for even far-off enemies.
This really is a set worthy of the legendary name-
Actually, no... A set that REDEFINES what it means to be a Bamboozler!"
(NA)

"The Bamboozler 14 Mk III takes the Mk I and swaps out the barrel for a different bamboo pipe. This set's selling point is how the Main weapon and the Burst Bombs can really hammer your opponent! That's not to mention the Inkstrike, which can make life difficult even for far-off enemies.
This really is a set worthy of the legendary name-
Actually, no... A set that SURPASSES the legendary name of Bamboozler!"
(EU/OC)

The Bamboozler 14 Mk III was released on 3 April 2019 at 01:00 UTC as part of the 4.6.0 version release.[5]. It comes with Fizzy Bomb and Bubble Blower.

- The Bamboozler 14 Mk III is a lightweight weapon.

- The matchmaking range is 210. The game's matchmaking system looks at a team's average matchmaking range value, and matches them against a team with a similar average.

- Ink consumption scales from 3.36% to 8.4% depending on the charge level.
The full-charge ink consumption of 8.4% allows players to fire 11 shots before needing to refill the ink supply.
This stat can be changed with Ink Saver (Main).

- The full-charge ink consumption of 8.4% allows players to fire 11 shots before needing to refill the ink supply.

- This stat can be changed with Ink Saver (Main).

- The Bamboozler 14 Mk III cannot store its charge.

- It takes 0.33 seconds to fully charge the weapon.
When charging a shot with an empty tank, the charge rate is 20%, permitting the player to fully charge a shot in 1.67 seconds.
When charging a shot while in the air, the charge rate is 40%, permitting the player to fully charge a shot in 0.83 seconds.

- When charging a shot with an empty tank, the charge rate is 20%, permitting the player to fully charge a shot in 1.67 seconds.

- When charging a shot while in the air, the charge rate is 40%, permitting the player to fully charge a shot in 0.83 seconds.

- Fully charged shots will not pierce opponents.

- When charging while moving, the player's movement speed is set to 0.6 units per frame.

- After firing, there is a 20 frame cooldown before the ink tank starts refilling.

- Damage scales from 30 to 85 depending on the charge level.

- Shot velocity is always 40, regardless of charge level.

- Shot distance is always 195.64, regardless of charge level.

- The full-charge ink consumption of 8.4% allows players to fire 11 shots before needing to refill the ink supply.

- This stat can be changed with Ink Saver (Main).

- When charging a shot with an empty tank, the charge rate is 20%, permitting the player to fully charge a shot in 1.67 seconds.

- When charging a shot while in the air, the charge rate is 40%, permitting the player to fully charge a shot in 0.83 seconds.

- ▼ Reduced the effect of the Main Power Up gear ability.
Changed the amount of gear ability required to deal up to 99.9 damage from 4.1 times to 4.4 times the amount of the primary gear ability.
Each secondary gear ability is worth 0.3 of the primary gear ability.

- Changed the amount of gear ability required to deal up to 99.9 damage from 4.1 times to 4.4 times the amount of the primary gear ability.

- Each secondary gear ability is worth 0.3 of the primary gear ability.

- Changed the amount of gear ability required to deal up to 99.9 damage from 4.1 times to 4.4 times the amount of the primary gear ability.

- ▼ Increased minimum ink consumption by roughly 20%: 2.8% → 3.36%.

- ▼ Increased maximum ink consumption by roughly 20%: 7% → 8.4%.

The Bamboozler 14 Mk III is a charger based on the Mk I, but with a new loadout and a cool new look! Use the Fizzy Bomb to hem in your opponents, and bust out the main weapon to finish the fight when they try to escape! Then, brandish the Bubble Blower to foment a foamy fate for your foes, and set up your teammates for success in the process! For those aspiring to wield a legendary weapon and one day become a legend themselves, this set just may be your origin story!

- Promotional image
